mapper.sql: u.id AS "id", u.login_name AS "loginName", u.password AS "password", u.name AS "name", u.email AS "email", u.skin AS "skin", u.phone AS "phone", u.mobile AS "mobile", u.login_ip AS "loginIp", u.login_date AS "loginDate", u.login_flag AS "loginFlag", u.remarks AS "remarks", u.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.create_time AS "createTime", u.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u.update_time AS "updateTime", u.del_status AS "delStatus", d.id AS "department.id", d.name AS "department.name", d.parent_id AS "department.parent.id", u2.id AS "department.master.id", u2.name AS "department.master.name", a.id AS "department.area.id", a.name AS "department.area.name", a.parent_id AS "department.area.parent.id"
FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON d.id = u.department_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = d.master_id LEFT JOIN sys_area a ON a.id = d.area_id
